sentence: A look at the weighted underlying holdings of the WisdomTree U.S. LargeCap Dividend Fund (Symbol: DLN) shows an impressive 10.4% of holdings on a weighted basis have experienced insider buying within the past six months.

Philip Morris International Inc (Symbol: PM), which makes up 1.29% of the WisdomTree U.S. LargeCap Dividend Fund (Symbol: DLN), has seen 2 directors and officers purchase shares in the past six months, according to the recent Form 4 data.
The ETF holds a total of $24,724,549 worth of PM, making it the #19 largest holding.

The ETF holds $20,548,492 worth of HD, which represents approximately 1.07% of the ETF's total assets at last check.
